column2: "Ooh, so you think you've gotten really good at using a grenade launcher, do you?"
"Well isn't that nice, feeling all good about yourself like that? But that nice feeling is exactly what's going to get you killed, if you don't watch it."
"And if you die, that means there's one less person I can go on rampages with. So how about we go do some practice, to keep us humble?"
"As long as YOU keep doing the killing, your opponents won't be able to kill you, right?"
"Okay okay, let's go let's go. Just remember, keep shooting and massacring hostiles. After all, that's what we get paid for. Hee hee hee!"
